column4: I can't login system via X any more. I did nothing about it. the login dialog disappear.
when you say logging in via X, do you mean via GDM or what?
I would assume that you mean GDM...? At any rate, you could try restarting GDM at the virtual terminal
I don't know what else you could do
I mean the system startup , it should appear login dialog
I really don't know enough about the init scripts to help you there
perhaps some kind of error message got logged?
GDM = Gnome Display Manager, I think; it's the graphical login manager
I don't know what else to say; someone else might now
